manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_ad` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `image` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `title` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `urls` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `type` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_face` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ids` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_facedecoration` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_facemerge` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=51 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_facesticker` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=32 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_imgfilter` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=33 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_menu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `image` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `types` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `inurl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sort` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `visit` int(11) DEFAULT '1', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=24 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_more` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `inurl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `appid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_plaza` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `userid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `datas` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=258 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_seting` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `color` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `banquan` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `adid` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `visit` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `wecatimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `alipay` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `backimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_shop` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `types` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `urls` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_slider` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `remark` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `image` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `types` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `inurl` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_templet` ( `ids` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `name` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(256) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`ids`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_tplmsg` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '行id', `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '公号id', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '标题', `mid` varchar(128) NOT NULL COMMENT '微信模板消息id', `content` varchar(500) NOT NULL COMMENT '微信模板内容', `data` text NOT NULL COMMENT '模板参数', `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `emphasis` varchar(32) DEFAULT '', `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_tplmsg_bulk` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '行id', `uniacid` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '统一公号id', `mid` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '模板消息id', `remark` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '备注', `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0待群发|1群发中|2群发完成', `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `group` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1', `type` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openids` text NOT NULL COMMENT '粉丝编号', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=20 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_lshd_yanzhi_user` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `openid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `nickname` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '昵称', `headimg` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '头像', `creattime` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '创建时间', `formid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `sharenum` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `sharevisible` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `apply` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=696 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
